Snap_Shots.help: You fire both plasma pistols at once at a single target. Firing both pistols at once is slower than a single shot, but deals more damage, and the target may get knocked down by the force of the impact. The target also suffers reduced regeneration.
Snap_Shots.targetHelp: Your regeneration has been reduced and you are unable to fly.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Aimed_Shot.help: You quickly fire a round from one of your plasma pistols. Your target suffers lethal and energy damage, as well as a reduction in their regeneration.
Aimed_Shot.targetHelp: Your regeneration has been reduced and you are unable to fly.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Overcharged_Shots.help: You fire an overcharged round from one of your plasma pistols. This causes a burst of energy to be released on impact that can affect several targets, who suffer lethal and energy damage, as well as a reduction in their regeneration. Affected targets will also be set on fire.
Overcharged_Shots.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), High DMG (Lethal/Energy), Minor DoT (Fire), -Regen (Foe), -Fly (Foe)
Overcharged_Shots.targetHelp: You are suffering fire damage over time and your regeneration has been reduced. You are also unable to fly.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Fire damage over time.

Fusillade.help: You quickly fire several shots from your plasma pistols. These can hit multiple targets, causing lethal and energy damage. Affected targets also suffer a reduction in their regeneration.
Fusillade.targetHelp: Your regeneration has been reduced and you are unable to fly.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Minelayer.help: You begin dropping proximity mines around the battlefield.

Crusader_Fury.help: You are driven by an unrelenting fury. It boosts your awareness significantly, improving your chance to hit and perception. Additionally, you are acutely aware of the conditions on the battlefield, enabling you to better defend yourself and attack your foes, manifesting as increased defense and damage potential.
